dt: {bc}to put or use in the place of another
{bc}to introduce (an atom or group) as a {a_link|substituent}
{bc}to alter (something, such as a compound) by introduction of a substituent

shortdef: to put or use in the place of another
to introduce (an atom or group) as a substituent; also : to alter (something, such as a compound) by introduction of a substituent
to take the place of : replace
